Package fr.lirmm.chocominer.app.declarative.verifiers

package fr.lirmm.chocominer.app.declarative.verifiers
Contains verifiers for declarative data mining, which verify if a combination of constraints are coherent thus valid.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    fr.lirmm.chocominer.app.declarative.verifiers.exceptions
    Package containing exceptions thrown by verifiers that validate combinations of declarative constraints.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    ChocoMiningVerifier
    Its main task is to verify whether a certain combination of constraints (AbstractConstraint) is valid.
    DeclarativeVerifier
    The main task of a Verifier is to verify whether a certain combination of constraints (AbstractConstraint) is valid.
